feature.name: Spectrogram
feature.description: Frequency-reactive visualization that displays audio spectrum data with sketchy aesthetic.

tests.description: Spectrogram renders frequency bands as vertical bars/lines
Bar heights correspond to frequency magnitude
Spectrogram reacts in real-time as audio plays (<50ms latency feel)
Spectrogram accepts color palette from mood mapper
Spectrogram intensity is controllable (affects bar count/thickness)
Spectrogram gracefully handles no audio (flat or minimal state)
Spectrogram supports horizontal and vertical orientations

priorDecisions: CanvasRenderer provides drawLine() with configurable wobble/sketchiness
AudioAnalyzer outputs frequency data as Float32Array (FFT)
MoodMapper outputs ColorPalette with primary, secondary, accent colors
context.notes: Spectrogram goes in src/primitives/Spectrogram/. Use CanvasRenderer's sketchy drawing utilities. Consider mirroring/symmetry option for later.
